pages.text: 37|77|geuui jason-eulo hayeogeum saengjon ke hayeossnola
37|78|hananim-eun hue eul sedaedeul-eul wihae geuege chugbog-eul namgyeo
37|79|husedae gaunde noa-ege pyeong an-i issdolog hayeossnola
37|80|icheoleom hananim-eun seon-eul haengha neun jadeul-ege bosanghanani
37|81|hananim-ui chungsilhan han jong-ieoss nola
37|82|geuligo hananim-eun bulsinhan na meojileul igsake hayeossnola
37|83|sillo geuleul ttaleuneun mulijung-e abeulaham-i iss-eossnola
37|84|geuga gyeong-geonha ma-eum-eulo ju kkelo wass-eul ttae
37|85|abeojiwa geuui baegseong-ege yeo leobun-i sungbaehaneun geos-i mueos-inyo
37|86|yeoleobun-i sungbaehaneun geugeos-eun hananim-i anin heowiui usang-i a nideonyo
37|87|man-yuui junim-e gwanhayeo yeoleo bun-eun eotteohge saenglahaneunyo
37|88|geuleon hu geuneun byeoldeul-eul chyeoda bogoseo
37|89|malhagil sillo nae ma-eum-i apeudoda
37|90|geuleoja salamdeul-i deung-eul dolli go tteonassdeola
37|91|geuhu geuga geudeul-ui sin-ege da gaga neohuineun neohui ap-e malyeondoen eum sig-eul meogji moshaneunyo
37|92|mal-eul haji anhneunde eotteon il-i iss-eossneunyo
37|93|geuleon hu geuneun dagaga oleun son-eulo geugeos-eul busuwo beolyeossdeola
37|94|geuhu usang sungbaejadeul-i geubhi seodulleo dallyeowa geuleul daehani
37|95|geuga malhagil yeoleobun-i mandeun usang-eul sungbaehandan mal-inyo
37|96|hananimkkeseo yeoleobun-eul changjohasyeossgo yeoleobun-i mandeun geosdo geuleoha dago hani
37|97|geudeul-i malhagil hwadeog-eul mandeul-eotaoleuneun bulsog-eulo geuleul deonjila
37|98|igeos-i silpaehani geudeul-eun da leun eummoleul kkumyeoss-euna hananim-eun geu deul-eul gajang bicheonhan jadeullo mandeul-eoss nola
37|99|geuga malhagil naui junimkkelo galini geubunkkeseo naleul indohayeo jusil geos-ila
37|100|juyeo jeoege sunjonghal jason-euljuobsoseo
37|101|geulihayeo hananim-eun innaeha myeo sunjonghal aiga iss-eul bog-eum-ui so sig-eul geuege jueossnola

37|102|adeul-ui naiga geuwa hamkke ilhal naie ileuleoss-eul ttae geuga malhagil nae adeul-a neoleul jedan-e eul lilaneun myeonglyeong-eul naega kkum-eseo boass nola neoui saeng-gag-i eotteonji algo sip guna lago hani adeul-i malhagil a beoji dangsinkkeseo myeonglyeongbad-eun daelo ha obsoseo hananimkkeseo innaehaneun jong-eu lobuteo wonhasindamyeon dangsinkkeseo jeoleul balgyeonhal geos-ibnida hayeossdeola
